Frame Sync Status

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x98
Size:
0x4
Source:
msk_top_regs.rdl

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:26] frame_sync_errors rw 0x0 Frames Sync Errors
[25:2] frames_received rw 0x0 Frames Received
[1] frame_buffer_overflow r, rclr 0x0 Frame Buffer Overflow
[0] frame_sync_locked r 0x0 Frame Sync Lock

Field Descriptions

frame_sync_errors - Frames Sync Errors

Count of frame sync errors. Value is 0 to 63. Counter rolls over when max count is reached.

frames_received - Frames Received

Count of frames received. Value is 0x00_0000 to 0xFF_FFFF. Counter rolls over when max count is reached.

frame_buffer_overflow - Frame Buffer Overflow

0 - Normal operation 1 - Buffer overflow

frame_sync_locked - Frame Sync Lock

0 - Frame sync not locked 1 - Frame sync locked
